full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/2/2023 OF 5RS PINDIA HRC 1 CHINDIN FRYPAISE SOCA and NOTARIAL THEIAL INDIA FIVE RUPEES FIVE RUPEES To whom it may concern. Affidavit of S. Nirmal Singh son of S. prem Singh, resident of 109/306 C. Ram Krishna Nagar,Kampur Deponent I, the above -named deponent do hereby solemnly affirm and state onoath as under:-h 1. That the deponent is aged about 72 years.hi 2. That the deponent's elder brother S.Sant singh Dua son of S.Prem Singh, resident of 109/306 A, R .K. Nagar, Kanpur W.P. India has been married with Mrs. Bhagwant Kaur D/O S- Gyan singh, in the year 1935 at Noshehra (pakistan) oh 3. That the date of birth of the deponent's elder brother is in the year 1914. h verification. I S.Nirmal Singh deponent do hereby verify that the contents of paras nos. 1,2 nd 3 are true to my personal knowledge and that no pat of itisfalse, and that nothing has been concealed, so help 1/8.may God. S sk Verified this 4th day of July 1987 compound, Kanpur. the ic. Anum Deponent. Mthan whohes human, advocate Nirrary Sangur Diess 4.7.07 4/7/00
